content: please note feel free to contact me if you find big mistakes but i don t offer any support for this free pattern thank you this pattern is written in english **italian version** 1 translated by mirella 2 **japanese version** 3 finished measurements 48 / 120 cm in length by 8 / 20 cm width for long version 24 / 60 cm in length by 8 / 20 cm width for short version yarn rowan kid classic 2-2 5 1-1 5 skeins shown in smudge puppy multico 4 2 skeins shown in col 563 needles 5 0 mm 36 / 90 cm 24 / 45 cm circular needle change needle size if necessary to obtain gauge notions stitch marker for beginning of round tapestry needle for weaving in end **n b please work every slip_stitch with purl wise ** 1 http //dl dropbox com/u/40228532/cupido%20cowl%20ita pdf 2 http //www ravelry com/people/mirella 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/untitled-12
